meanings.sent1: In the forest, the grex of oak trees provided a safe home for many animals.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper carefully monitored the grex of penguins to ensure their well-being.
meanings.sent3: The grex of sunflowers in the garden seemed to be gossiping with the wind.
meanings.sent4: The grex of dolphins danced gracefully in the ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The grex of wolves howled together under the full moon.
